l:dependency.name: View Job Filters
l:dependency.l:description: Manage multiple views and hundreds of jobs much more easily. This plug-in provides more ways to include/exclude jobs from a view, including filtering by SCM path, and by any job or build status type, as well as "chaining" of filters and negating filters.

l:dependency.name: JSch
l:dependency.l:description: JSch is a pure Java implementation of SSH2
